title: Define and describe insitutions for rule of law

content.question: Define the term “rule of law.” Describe an institutional arrangement that promotes the rule of law in democratic regimes. Explain why authoritarian regimes resist the rule of law.

frqParts.text: Define the term “rule of law.” Describe an institutional arrangement that promotes the rule of law in democratic regimes. Explain why authoritarian regimes resist the rule of law.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
